   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Dec  6 13:04:27 2021.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to InCens' documentation
==================================

InCens contains python codes to compute information transfer through central dogma reactions as a function of the central dogma rates constants.

:Author:
   Swarnavo Sarkar

If you are using any part of this package, please cite: 
`S. Sarkar and J. Rammohan, Nearly maximal information gain due to time integration in central dogma reactions, bioRxiv (2022) <https://doi.org/10.1101/2022.01.02.474710>`_


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Contents:

   Computation_of_ideal_channel_capacity.ipynb
   Central_dogma_simulator.ipynb
   C-vs-T-with_finite-sampling_correction.ipynb
   Integration_time_of_species.ipynb
   kMC
   BA_C
